description: This file defines a custom singly linked list implementation in Kotlin, including methods for adding, removing, retrieving elements, and computing the list size.

classes.name: LinkedList
classes.description: A singly linked list class with basic operations such as add, remove, get, and size.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds an element to the end of the list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the first occurrence of the specified element from the list.

methods.name: unlink
methods.description: Helper method to unlink a node from the list.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in the list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at the specified index.
